python:
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from mqtt import *
from event_manager import *
import time

event_manager.reset()

def on_event_timer_callback_Q_S_w_l_W():

  mqtt.publish('V3', (temperature()))
  mqtt.publish('V4', (light_level()))

event_manager.add_timer_event(2000, on_event_timer_callback_Q_S_w_l_W)

if True:
  display.scroll('ooo')
  mqtt.connect_wifi('Redmi 9', '25102003')
  mqtt.connect_broker(server='mqtt.ohstem.vn', port=1883, username='yolo', password='')

while True:
  mqtt.check_message()
  event_manager.run()
  time.sleep_ms(2000)
name: IoT_2
